product_name: DIBS BeautyLoveBeam Blurring & Balancing Face & Body Setting Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackDIBS Beauty's LoveBeam Setting Spray blurs, balances, hydrates, preps, and sets for a glassy-matte finish in one spritz. It's the mist that does the most!
details: DetailsFeaturesBlurred, balanced finish with a glassy-matte finishBi-phase blend that activates with a quick shakePreps, extends, and refreshes - in one spritzSkincare-boosted with alkaline water, kombucha black tea ferment, snow mushroom, peptides, and goji berry extractCruelty-free, clean, and vegan formulaSafe for sensitive skinAllergy- and dermatologist-testedKey IngredientsAlkaline Water: Calms and balances skin toneSnow Mushroom Extract: Delivers hydration and plumping benefitsPeptides: Boost elasticity and smoothnessBlack Tea Ferment (Kombucha Extract): Known to reduce breakouts and promote skin clarityGoji Berry Extract: Provides antioxidant protection for a healthy glowFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesItem 2640355How To UseShake well to activate the bi-phase blend. Hold 8-10 inches away and mist evenly over your face or body. Close your eyes to avoid contact during application. Use before makeup to prep, during application to enhance blend, and after to set your look.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Polysilicone-11, SD Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Dimethicone, Triethyl Citrate, Xylitylglucoside, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp (Snow Mushroom) Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Saccharomyces/Xylinum/Black Tea Ferment, Portulaca Grandiflora Extract, Nicotiana Sylvestris Leaf Cell Culture, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Sodium Bicarbonate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Polyglyceryl-3 Cocoate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, PolyglyceryL-6 Ricinoleate, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Phenoxyethanol, Laureth-12, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Pentylene Glycol, Amodimethicone, Carbomer, Disodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Biotin, Red 40 (CI 16035).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well to activate the bi-phase blend. Hold 8-10 inches away and mist evenly over your face or body. Close your eyes to avoid contact during application. Use before makeup to prep, during application to enhance blend, and after to set your look.

reviews.headline: Looks drying
reviews.comments: The reviews on this spray are so good so i couldn't wait to try it. It wasn't dewy at all. It actually dried down with a matte finish and seemed to exaggerate fine lines. I looked older and not hydrated. I have so many setting sprays that are so much more glowy looking. This was a return.

reviews.headline: Amazing setting spray butâ€¦
reviews.comments: Love this setting spray. Only down side was product came almost empty due to package open in shipping. :(

reviews.headline: Awesome
reviews.comments: Im 56 and love this.  Not heavy, great smell.  My skin looks so supple & healthy with this.  Buying my next one now.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: This is by far my fav setting spray. Mister on it is amazing and the spray smells amazing! Kind of like a light strawberry sugar cookie. As far as how well it sets my makeup, 10/10. I have dry skin so when I apply powder, i worry about creasing. This setting spray 100% improves creasing theoughout the day. Def gonna be my one and only.

reviews.headline: Mid-day refresh
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this spray. I use it as a midday refresh for my makeup and attitude l. A few spritzes and me and my tude are good as new! It smells wonderful and the spritz is perfection - not too wet, not too dry, not too big of droplets, no so fine you can't sense it. Perfection! Fits perfectly in my purse and doesnt leave a residue on my clothes or jewelry.

reviews.headline: Super Size it!!!
reviews.comments: I had been waiting for this to come to Ulta and was so excited to pick this up. Not only is the smell heaven, but it help my makeup looking fresh all day!my only complaint is i want it in a bigger size!!!

reviews.headline: buying a second one already for my car
reviews.comments: I am beyond obsessed with how this spray smells. I love that it's now on Ulta because I have been using it since it came out and it just makes my day so much brighter!

faceoff_positive.comments: Absolutely love this spray. I use it as a midday refresh for my makeup and attitude l. A few spritzes and me and my tude are good as new! It smells wonderful and the spritz is perfection - not too wet, not too dry, not too big of droplets, no so fine you can't sense it. Perfection! Fits perfectly in my purse and doesnt leave a residue on my clothes or jewelry.
